column3: Concept ACK - thanks for splitting this up. I've swapped out #10785 for this PR in the high-prio project.

ACK 9250a087d2f450f37342010aea0a5d583eea508b ([`jamesob/ackr/17850.1.sipa.serialization_improvemen`](https://github.com/jamesob/bitcoin/tree/ackr/17850.1.sipa.serialization_improvemen)) Code looks good. I pulled locally, built, ran `make -j 4 check`.
Show signature data

``` -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE----- Hash: SHA512 ACK 9250a087d2f450f
BTW, #10785 is an anagram of this, its replacement, #17850. Threw me for a loop there for a second.
@jamesob and you think it's a coincidence? \n\nConcept ACK.
> BTW, #10785 is an anagram of this, its replacement, #17850.\n\nSame digits, but serialized differently.
